Generated Narrative: ImplementationGuide rarelink-ig

RareLinkImplementationGuide

The official URL for this implementation guide is: 

https://github.com/BIH-CEI/RareLink/ImplementationGuide/rarelink-ig

An Implementation Guide for RareLink Common Data Model, based on the ontology-based rare disease common data model (RD-CDM) harmonising the European Rare Disease Infrastructure Common Data Set, HL7 FHIR R4, and Phenopackets; and integrating the IPS 2.0.2 profiles and Genomics Reporting 3.0.0 profiles.

{% endraw %}
